verses.roman:
caturdvāre karaha uttama navya vāsa
rāmānanda, yāha tumi mahāprabhu-pāśa

synonyms: caturdvāre—at the place named Caturdvāra; karaha—make; uttama—very nice; navya vāsa—new residential quarters; rāmānanda—Rāmānanda Rāya; yāha tumi—you please go; mahāprabhu-pāśa—near Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: The King continued, "At Caturdvāra, please construct new residential quarters. Now, Rāmānanda, you can return to Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu."
